_meta.name: Gear information
_meta.short-description: Basic references on how to gear up a character
_meta.long-description: This will post basic references on how to gear up a character.

gear.response:
So you want to gear up your character, right? Ana has hired me to tell you to read <https://wiki.guildwars2.com/wiki/User:Tanetris/So_You_Want_To_Gear_a_Character> or watch <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8xxH0xIjGag>.
Good luck and please don't shoot the messenger!

Hey there!

I'm sorry to inform you that you will temporarily be unable to sign up for scheduled raids.

Moderation Reason:
{{reason}}

This is likely because you have signed up for multiple raids that you haven't shown up for and haven't given adequate notice of withdrawal. Other possible reasons can include: double booking, bringing builds that we judge are detrimental to the progress of other trainees in the context of the training session, behaviour that is detrimental to the progress of other trainees, etc.

This timeout will expire around *{{date, ll LT z}}* without notification. This DM is an automated message. **Do not** reply to this DM directly. If you wish to appeal to this timeout, please contact one of the staff members or moderators. Have a good day.
